columns: Which part of Cuddalore is the aid needed for?

Status of Request (Colour Code Necessary)
- Verified & Helped - Green
- Verified & Status not known/Not Helped - Red
- Not Verified - Grey
rows: Cuddalore district KURINJIPADI 30 km from cuddalore
water and food reached, expecting dresses, mat, blankets, napkins
